SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.levels

Class LevelParent

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
com.example.demo.levels.LevelParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelFour, LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo
public abstract class LevelParent extends Observable
Represents a parent class for game levels.

    • LevelParent

      public LevelParent(String backgroundImageName, double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int playerInitialHealth)
      Constructs a LevelParent with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageName - the name of the background image
      screenHeight - the height of the screen
      screenWidth - the width of the screen
      playerInitialHealth - the initial health of the player
